trans-unit.source: PhantomJS is a headless browser alternative to Selenium Server that implements the WebDriver protocol. It allows you to run Selenium tests on a server without a GUI installed.
trans-unit.target: PhantomJS是Selenium Server 的无头浏览器替代品，可实现WebDriver协议。它允许您在未安装GUI的服务器上运行Selenium测试。

trans-unit.source: PhantomJS is a customized WebKit-based headless browser built for programmatic usage only. It doesn’t display a browser window and doesn’t require GUI (display server) to be installed. This makes PhantomJS highly popular for Continuous Integration systems. PhantomJS needs only one binary with no extra dependencies which make it the simplest WebDriver tool to install.
trans-unit.target: PhantomJS是基于WebKit的定制无头浏览器，仅用于编程用途。它不会显示浏览器窗口，也不需要安装GUI（显示服务器）。这使得PhantomJS在持续集成系统中非常受欢迎。PhantomJS只需要一个二进制文件而没有任何额外的依赖关系，这使其成为最简单的WebDriver工具安装。

trans-unit.source: Place the codeception.yml file into the root folder of your project and specify the paths to the other codeception.yml configurations that you want to include:

trans-unit.target: 请记住,所有的字符串键和值必须用双引号(`"`")括起来。

trans-unit.source: Please make sure you have docker or Docker Toolbox installed. Docker experience is required as well.
trans-unit.target: 请确保您已安装 docker 或Docker Toolbox。Docker经验也是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Please note that :num1 placeholder can be used for strings and numbers (may contain currency sign). In current case :num1 matches $600 and $num1 is assigned to be 600. If you need to receive exact string, wrap the value into quotes: "600$"
trans-unit.target: 请注意 :num1 占位符可用于字符串和数字（​​可能包含货币符号）。在当前情况下 :num1 与 $600 匹配，并且 $num1 被分配为600。如果需要接收确切的字符串，请将值包装在引号中： "600$"

trans-unit.source: Please note that actions executed in a browser will behave differently. For instance, seeElement won’t just check that the element exists on a page, but it will also check that element is actually visible to the user:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在浏览器中执行的动作的行为会有所不同。例如， seeElement 不仅会检查页面上是否存在该元素，还会检查该元素对用户是否实际可见：

trans-unit.source: Please note that methods with a _ prefix are not added to the Actor class. This allows them to be defined as public but used only for internal purposes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，带有 _ 前缀的方法不会添加到Actor类。这允许将它们定义为公共的，但仅用于内部目的。

trans-unit.source: Please note that regular expressions should start and end with / char. Regex is also used to match parameters and pass them as arguments into methods.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，正则表达式应以 / char 开头和结尾。正则表达式还用于匹配参数，并将其作为参数传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: Please note, that PHP SoapServer::handle method sends additional headers. This may trigger warning: “Cannot modify header information” If you use PHP SoapServer with framework, try to block call to this method in testing environment.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，PHP SoapServer :: handle方法发送其他标头。这可能会触发警告：“无法修改标头信息”如果将PHP SoapServer与框架一起使用，请尝试在测试环境中阻止对此方法的调用。

trans-unit.source: Preparing data for testing is a very creative, although boring, task. If you create a record, you need to fill in all the fields of the model. It is much easier to use Faker for this task, which is more effective to set up data generation rules for models. Such a set of rules is called factories and are provided by the DataFactory module.
trans-unit.target: 准备数据进行测试是一项非常有创意的任务，尽管很无聊。如果创建记录，则需要填写模型的所有字段。使用Faker来完成此任务要容易得多，这对于设置模型的数据生成规则更为有效。这样的一组规则称为工厂，由DataFactory模块提供。

trans-unit.target: SOAP请求可能包含特定于应用程序的信息，例如身份验证或付款。此信息随XML请求的 <soap:Header> 元素内的SOAP标头一起提供。如果您需要提交此类标头，则可以使用 haveSoapHeader 操作。例如，下一行代码

trans-unit.source: SOAP web services are usually more complex. You will need PHP configured with SOAP support. Good knowledge of XML is required too. SOAP module uses specially formatted POST request to connect to WSDL web services. Codeception uses PhpBrowser or one of framework modules to perform interactions. If you choose using a framework module, SOAP will automatically connect to the underlying framework. That may improve the speed of a test execution and will provide you with more detailed stack traces.
trans-unit.target: SOAP Web服务通常更复杂。您将需要配置有SOAP支持的 PHP 。也需要对XML有足够的了解。 SOAP 模块使用特殊格式的POST请求来连接到WSDL Web服务。Codeception使用 PhpBrowser 或框架模块之一执行交互。如果选择使用框架模块，则SOAP将自动连接到基础框架。这样可以提高测试执行的速度，并为您提供更详细的堆栈跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Scenarios can become more descriptive when you represent repeating data as tables. Instead of writing several steps “I have product with :num1 $ price in my cart” we can have one step with multiple values in it.

trans-unit.source: Since Codeception 3.0 you can have some actions to fail silently, if they are errored. Let’s say, you open a page and some times there is a popup which should be closed. We may try to hit the “close” button but if this action fails (no popup on page) we just continue the test.
trans-unit.target: 从Codeception 3.0开始，如果有错误，您可以采取一些措施使它们静默失败。假设您打开一个页面，有时会弹出一个窗口，应该将其关闭。我们可能会尝试点击“关闭”按钮，但是如果此操作失败（页面上没有弹出窗口），我们将继续测试。

trans-unit.source: Since Codeception 3.0 you can have some actions to fail silently, is they are errored. Let’s say, you open a page and some times there is a popup which should be closed. We may try to hit the “close” button but if this action fails (no popup on page) we just continue the test.
trans-unit.target: 从Codeception 3.0开始，您可以采取一些措施使它们静默失败，因为它们是错误的。假设您打开一个页面，有时会有一个弹出窗口应关闭。我们可能会尝试点击“关闭”按钮，但是如果此操作失败（页面上没有弹出窗口），我们将继续测试。

trans-unit.source: Since Codeception 3.0 you can pause execution in any point and enter interactive shell where you will be able to try commands in action. All you need to do is to call $I->pause() in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: 从Codeception 3.0开始，您可以随时暂停执行，然后输入交互式shell，您将可以在其中尝试运行命令。您需要做的就是在调试模式下调用 $I->pause() 。

trans-unit.source: Since Codeception 3.0 you can pause the execution at any point and enter an interactive shell where you will be able to try different commands in action. All you need to do is call $I->pause() somewhere in your test, then run the test in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: 从Codeception 3.0开始，您可以随时暂停执行并输入一个交互式Shell，您可以在其中尝试使用不同的命令。您需要做的就是在测试中的某处调用 $I->pause() ，然后在调试模式下运行测试。

trans-unit.source: Some environments are hard to be reproduced manually, testing Internet Explorer 6-8 on Windows XP may be a hard thing, especially if you don’t have Windows XP installed. This is where Cloud Testing services come to help you. Services such as SauceLabs, BrowserStack and others can create virtual machines on demand and set up Selenium Server and the desired browser. Tests are executed on a remote machine in a cloud, to access local files cloud testing services provide a special application called Tunnel. Tunnel operates on a secured protocol and allows browsers executed in a cloud to connect to a local web server.
trans-unit.target: 某些环境很难手动复制，在Windows XP上测试Internet Explorer 6-8可能很难，特别是如果您没有安装Windows XP。这就是云测试服务可以帮助您的地方。服务如SauceLabs，BrowserStack和其他人可以根据需要创建和设置Selenium服务器和所需的浏览器的虚拟机。测试是在云中的远程计算机上执行的，以访问本地文件。云测试服务提供了一个称为Tunnel的特殊应用程序。隧道以安全协议运行，并允许在云中执行的浏览器连接到本地Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is needed to set custom configuration for a specific test only. For Cest and Test\Unit formats you can use @prepare annotation which can execute the code before other hooks are executed. This allows @prepare to change the module configuration in runtime. @prepare uses dependency injection to automatically inject required modules into a method.
trans-unit.target: 有时仅需要为特定测试设置自定义配置。对于Cest和Test \ Unit格式，可以使用 @prepare 批注，该批注可以在执行其他挂钩之前执行代码。这允许 @prepare 在运行时更改模块配置。 @prepare 使用依赖项注入将所需的模块自动注入到方法中。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you may need to change the test behavior in real time. For instance, the behavior of the same test may differ in Firefox and in Chrome. In runtime we can retrieve the current environment name, test name, or list of enabled modules by calling the $scenario->current() method.
trans-unit.target: 有时您可能需要实时更改测试行为。例如，同一测试的行为在Firefox和Chrome中可能有所不同。在运行时，我们可以通过调用 $scenario->current() 方法来检索当前环境名称，测试名称或已启用模块的列表。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you may want to close a webpage before the end of the test. For such cases, you may use leave(). You can also specify roles for a friend:
trans-unit.target: 有时您可能想在测试结束前关闭网页。在这种情况下，您可以使用 leave() 。您还可以指定朋友的角色：

trans-unit.source: Special module for using asserts in your tests.
trans-unit.target: 用于在测试中使用断言的特殊模块。

trans-unit.source: Step decorators are used to implement conditional assertions. When enabled, conditional assertions take all method prefixed by see or dontSee and introduce new steps prefixed with canSee and cantSee. Contrary to standard assertions those assertions won’t stop test on failure. This is done by wrapping action into try/catch blocks.
trans-unit.target: 步骤装饰器用于实现条件断言。启用后，有条件的声明采取由前缀的方法 see 或 dontSee 并引入前缀的新措施 canSee 和 cantSee 。与标准断言相反，这些断言不会在失败时停止测试。这可以通过将动作包装到try / catch块中来完成。

trans-unit.source: Step decorators can be added to suite config inside steps block:
trans-unit.target: 可以在 steps 块中将步骤装饰器添加到套件配置中：

trans-unit.source: StepObject can be instantiated automatically when used inside the Cest format:
trans-unit.target: 当在Cest格式内使用时,可以自动实例化StepObject。

trans-unit.source: StepObjects are great if you need some common functionality for a group of tests. Let’s say you are going to test an admin area of a site. You probably won’t need the same actions from the admin area while testing the front end, so it’s a good idea to move these admin-specific tests into their own class. We call such a classes StepObjects.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要一组测试的通用功能，StepObjects就是很好的选择。假设您要测试站点的管理区域。在测试前端时，您可能不需要在管理区域中执行相同的操作，因此，将这些特定于管理员的测试移到自己的类中是一个好主意。我们称此类为StepObjects。

trans-unit.source: Steps are defined in Context files. Default context is an actor class, i.e. for acceptance testing suite default context is AcceptanceTester class. However, you can define steps in any classes and include them as contexts. It is useful to define steps in StepObject and PageObject classes.
trans-unit.target: 步骤在上下文文件中定义。默认上下文是一个actor类，即对于验收测试套件，默认上下文是 AcceptanceTester 类。但是，您可以在任何类中定义步骤并将其包括为上下文。在StepObject和PageObject类中定义步骤很有用。

trans-unit.source: Steps can also be matched with regex expressions. This way we can make more flexible steps
trans-unit.target: 步骤也可以用regex表达式来匹配。这样我们就可以使步骤更加灵活

trans-unit.source: TeamCity is a hosted solution from JetBrains. The setup of it can be a bit tricky as TeamCity uses its own reporter format for parsing test results. PHPUnit since version 5.x has integrated support for this format, so does Codeception. What we need to do is to configure Codeception to use custom reporter. By default there is --report option which provides an alternative output. You can change the reporter class in codeception.yml configuration:
trans-unit.target: TeamCity是JetBrains的托管解决方案。由于TeamCity使用其自己的报告程序格式来解析测试结果，因此它的设置可能有些棘手。从5.x版本开始，PHPUnit集成了对此格式的支持，Codeception也是如此。我们需要做的是将Codeception配置为使用自定义报告程序。默认情况下，有 --report 选项提供替代输出。您可以在 codeception.yml 配置中更改报告程序类：

trans-unit.source: Testing pieces of code before coupling them together is highly important as well. This way, you can be sure that some deeply hidden feature still works, even if it was not covered by functional or acceptance tests. This also shows care in producing stable and testable code.

trans-unit.source: Tests should not affect each other. That’s a rule of thumb. When tests interact with a database, they may change the data inside it, which would eventually lead to data inconsistency. A test may try to insert a record that has already been inserted, or retrieve a deleted record. To avoid test failures, the database should be brought back to its initial state before each test. Codeception has different methods and approaches to get your data cleaned.
trans-unit.target: 测试不应相互影响。这是一个经验法则。当测试与数据库交互时，它们可能会更改数据库中的数据，最终将导致数据不一致。测试可能会尝试插入已插入的记录，或检索已删除的记录。为了避免测试失败，应该在每次测试之前将数据库恢复到其初始状态。Codeception有不同的方法和方法来清理您的数据。

trans-unit.source: Tests will be randomly reordered on each run. When tests executed in shuffle mode a seed value will be printed. Copy this seed value from output to be able to rerun tests in the same order.
trans-unit.target: 测试将在每次运行时随机重新排序。当测试在shuffle模式下执行时,将打印一个种子值。从输出中复制这个种子值,以便能够以同样的顺序重新运行测试。

trans-unit.source: The FunctionalTester class has its methods defined in modules. Actually, it doesn’t contain any of them, but rather acts as a proxy. It knows which module executes this action and passes parameters into it. To make your IDE see all of the FunctionalTester methods, you should run the codecept build command. It generates method signatures from enabled modules and saves them into a trait which is included in an actor. In the current example, the tests/support/_generated/FunctionalTesterActions.php file will be generated. By default, Codeception automatically rebuilds the Actions trait on each change of the suite configuration.
trans-unit.target: FunctionalTester类在模块中定义了其方法。实际上，它不包含任何一个，而是充当代理。它知道哪个模块执行此操作并将参数传递给该模块。要使您的IDE查看所有FunctionalTester方法，应运行 codecept build 命令。它从启用的模块中生成方法签名，并将其保存到actor中包含的特征中。在当前示例中，将生成 tests/support/_generated/FunctionalTesterActions.php 文件。默认情况下，Codeception会在套件配置的每次更改时自动重建Actions特性。

trans-unit.source: There are lots of ways to create reusable and readable tests. Group common actions together and move them to an Actor class or StepObjects. Move CSS and XPath locators into PageObjects. Write your custom actions and assertions in Helpers. Scenario-driven tests should not contain anything more complex than $I->doSomething commands. Following this approach will allow you to keep your tests clean, readable, stable and make them easy to maintain.
trans-unit.target: 有很多方法可以创建可重用和可读的测试。将常见操作组合在一起，然后将其移至Actor类或StepObjects。将CSS和XPath定位器移到PageObjects中。在Helpers中编写您的自定义操作和断言。场景驱动的测试不应包含比 $I->doSomething 命令更复杂的内容。遵循这种方法将使您保持测试的清洁，可读性，稳定性，并使它们易于维护。

For web applications, testing just the controller and/or the model doesn’t prove that your application is working. To test the behavior of your application as a whole, you should write functional or acceptance tests.

trans-unit.source: There is the WebDriver module for acceptance testing, modules for all popular PHP frameworks, PHPBrowser to emulate browser execution, REST for testing APIs, and more. Modules are considered to be the most valuable part of Codeception. They are constantly improving to provide the best testing experience, and be flexible to satisfy everyone’s needs.
trans-unit.target: 有用于接受测试的 WebDriver 模块，用于所有流行的PHP框架的模块，用于模拟浏览器执行的 PHPBrowser ，用于测试API的 REST 等。模块被认为是Codeception最有价值的部分。他们不断改进以提供最佳的测试体验，并灵活地满足每个人的需求。

trans-unit.source: There may be some confusion between test.start/test.before and test.after/test.end. The start and end events are triggered by PHPUnit, but the before and after events are triggered by Codeception. Thus, when you are using classical PHPUnit tests (extended from PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase), the before/after events won’t be triggered for them. During the test.before event you can mark a test as skipped or incomplete, which is not possible in test.start. You can learn more from Codeception internal event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 在 test.start / test.before 和 test.after / test.end 之间可能会有混淆。开始和结束事件由PHPUnit触发，但before和after事件由Codeception触发。因此，当您使用经典的PHPUnit测试（从 PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase 扩展）时，before / after事件将不会为它们触发。在 test.before 事件期间，您可以将测试标记为已跳过或未完成，这在 test.start 中是不可能的。您可以从Codeception内部事件侦听器中了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: There may be some confusion between test.start/test.before and test.after/test.end. During the test.before event you can mark a test as skipped or incomplete, which is not possible in test.start. You can learn more from Codeception internal event listeners.

trans-unit.source: To avoid confusion, Framework modules, PhpBrowser, and WebDriver can’t be used together. For instance, the amOnPage method exists in all those modules, and you should not try to guess which module will actually execute it. If you are doing acceptance testing, set up either WebDriver or PHPBrowser but do not set both up at the same time. If you are doing functional testing, enable only one of the framework modules.
trans-unit.target: 为避免混淆，不能将Framework模块，PhpBrowser和WebDriver一起使用。例如，所有这些模块中都存在 amOnPage 方法，并且您不应尝试猜测哪个模块将实际执行它。如果要进行验收测试，请设置WebDriver或PHPBrowser，但不要同时设置两者。如果要进行功能测试，请仅启用框架模块之一。

trans-unit.source: To enable the database functionality in unit tests, make sure the Db module is included in the unit.suite.yml configuration file. trans-unit.source: To provide the same configuration template for your development team, you can create a codeception.dist.yml config file, which will be loaded before codeception.yml. trans-unit.source: Under the hood, Codeception uses Symfony’s BrowserKit to “send” requests to your app. So there’s no real HTTP request made, but rather a BrowserKit Request object with the required properties is passed to your framework’s (font-)controller.
trans-unit.target: 在后台，Codeception使用Symfony的BrowserKit将请求“发送”到您的应用程序。因此，没有真正的HTTP请求，而是将具有必需属性的BrowserKit Request对象传递到框架的（font-）控制器。

默认情况下使用 config/container.php 文件。

trans-unit.source: Usually, as soon as any assertion fails, further assertions of this test will be skipped. Sometimes you don’t want this - maybe you have a long-running test and you want it to run to the end. In this case, you can use conditional assertions. Each see method has a corresponding canSee method, and dontSee has a cantSee method:
trans-unit.target: 通常，一旦任何断言失败，该测试的其他断言就会被跳过。有时您不希望这样做-也许您有一个长期运行的测试，并且希望它运行到最后。在这种情况下，您可以使用条件断言。每个 see 方法都有一个对应的 canSee 方法，而 dontSee 有一个 cantSee 方法：

trans-unit.source: Validates and prints Codeception config. Use it do debug Yaml configs
trans-unit.target: 验证并打印Codeception配置。用它来调试Yaml配置

trans-unit.source: Validates current config for required fields and required packages.
trans-unit.target: 验证当前所需字段和所需包的配置。
验证数据 JSON 响应

trans-unit.source: Variable names are being taken from config and DSN which has a keyword=value format, so you should expect to have a variable named as the keyword with the full value inside it.
trans-unit.target: 变量名称是从config和DSN中获取的，它们的格式为 keyword=value ，因此您应该期望其中包含一个具有关键字的变量，且其中包含完整的值。

trans-unit.source: Waits for element and runs a sequence of actions inside its context. Actions can be defined with array, callback, or Codeception\Util\ActionSequence instance.
trans-unit.target: 等待元素并在其上下文中运行一系列动作。可以使用数组，回调或 Codeception\Util\ActionSequence 实例定义操作。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for an element to appear on the page. If the element doesn’t appear, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 最多等待$ timeout秒，元素才会显示在页面上。如果没有出现该元素，则抛出超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to be clickable. If element doesn’t become clickable, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 最多等待$ timeout秒以使给定元素可单击。如果element不可单击，则抛出超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to be visible on the page. If element doesn’t appear, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 等待最多$ timeout秒，使给定元素在页面上可见。如果没有出现element，则抛出超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to become invisible. If element stays visible, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定的元素变成不可见的时间,最长为$timeout秒。如果元素一直可见,则会产生超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to change. Element “change” is determined by a callback function which is called repeatedly until the return value evaluates to true.
trans-unit.target: 等待最多$ timeout秒以更改给定的元素。元素“ change”由回调函数确定，该回调函数被重复调用，直到返回值评估为true。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given string to appear on the page.
trans-unit.target: 最多等待$timeout秒的时间,让指定的字符串出现在页面上。

trans-unit.source: We are using Codeception\Util\Xml class which allows us to build XML structures in a clean manner. The toXml method may accept a string or array and returns \DOMDocument instance. If your XML contains attributes and so can’t be represented as a PHP array you can create XML using the XmlBuilder class. We will take a look at it a bit more in next section.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在使用 Codeception\Util\Xml 类，该类允许我们以干净的方式构建XML结构。该 toXml 方法可以接受字符串或阵列，并返回\ DOM文档实例。如果XML包含属性，因此不能表示为PHP数组，则可以使用XmlBuilder类创建XML 。在下一部分中，我们将对其进行更多的研究。

trans-unit.source: We propose to perform those steps using a task runner. In this guide we will use Robo task runner. It is a modern PHP task runner that is very easy to use. It uses Symfony Process to spawn background and parallel processes. Just what we need for the step 2! What about steps 1 and 3? We have created robo tasks for splitting tests into groups and merging resulting JUnit XML reports.
